Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier  police activity near Montrose. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier  police activity near Montrose.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
